text: Extreme Rules (2010) was a professional wrestling pay-per-view show made by World Wrestling Entertainment. It was held on April 25, 2010 at the 1st Mariner Arena in Baltimore, Maryland. It was the second Extreme Rules event held by the WWE. ==Matches== # Matches Stipulations Times Dark Kofi Kingston defeated Dolph Ziggler Singles match 9:36 1 The Hart Dynasty (David Hart Smith and Tyson Kidd) (with Natalya and Bret Hart) defeated ShoMiz (The Big Show and The Miz), John Morrison and R-Truth, and The World's Strongest Tag Team (Montel Vontavious Porter and Mark Henry) Gauntlet match If ShoMiz lost, the winning team would have earned a future Unified WWE Tag Team Championship match. 5:18 2 CM Punk (with Luke Gallows and Serena) defeated Rey Mysterio Hair match If Punk lost, he would have had his head shaved by Mysterio 15:57 3 JTG defeated Shad Gaspard Strap match 4:41 4 Jack Swagger (c) defeated Randy Orton Extreme Rules match for the World Heavyweight Championship 13:59 5 Sheamus defeated Triple H Street Fight 15:46 6 Beth Phoenix defeated Michelle McCool (c) (with Vickie Guerrero and Layla) Extreme Makeover match for the WWE Women's Championship 6:32 7 Edge defeated Chris Jericho Steel cage match 19:59 8 John Cena (c) defeated Batista Last Man Standing match for the WWE Championship 24:34 (c) â€“ refers to the champion(s) heading into the match ==References== ==Other websites== *Official Extreme Rules 2010 website Category:2010 in professional wrestling Category:Sports in Baltimore Category:WWE Extreme Rules Category:2010s in Baltimore Category:2010 in the United States Category:April 2010 events
title: Extreme Rules (2010)
